actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide employment opportunities for unemployed and underemployed persons and to promote safe and efficient service by rail.

summary.text: Rail Emergency Employment Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to provide financial assistance to common carriers engaged in transportation by railroad for wages of persons employed to maintain and improve their right-of-way structures. Directs that such funds will not be provided for programs which will result in the displacement of currently employed workers. Authorizes the appropriation of $250,000,000 to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide employment opportunities for unemployed and underemployed persons and to promote safe and efficient service by rail.
